Class AverageNBAPlayer

java.lang.Object
ComparePlayers
BasketballPlayer
AverageNBAPlayer
public class AverageNBAPlayer extends BasketballPlayer
This class is a child to BasketballPlayer class. This class allows this program to examine all the player's season statistics in each category and create an average baseline player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AverageNBAPlayer(String name, float ppg, float rpg, float apg, float spg, float bpg, float topg)
    This is a constructor that makes an Average NBA Player with all their combined average season statistics from their real actual statistics from a text file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    toString()
    This method correctly formats the information of the AverageNBAPlayer class when printing the league's combined season average statistics.

  • Constructor Details

    • AverageNBAPlayer

      public AverageNBAPlayer(String name, float ppg, float rpg, float apg, float spg, float bpg, float topg)
      This is a constructor that makes an Average NBA Player with all their combined average season statistics from their real actual statistics from a text file.
      Parameters:
      name - variable for the name of the player
      ppg - variable for a player's points per game
      rpg - variable for a player's rebounds per game
      apg - variable for a player's assists per game
      spg - variable for a player's steals per game
      bpg - variable for a player's blocks per game
      topg - variable for a player's turnovers per game
